articles.title: My first blog post
articles.content: Hi, I'm Maurizio, and I'm a programmer, this is my space to share my ideas with the world, soon I will share articles regarding the world of programming, stay around.

articles.title: Python training
articles.content: Hi, starting today there is a space available where you can learn to program with the most used language in the world: Python. I created a repository on github with some lessons that explain step by step how to learn the fundamentals of this language. Good study!

articles.title: Git training
articles.content: Hi, today I added a new repository where I explain the git software, the application for versioning your projects. I created a repository on github with some lessons that explain step by step how to learn the fundamentals of this application. Happy studying!
